td.content: s:58 yr old m presents with mild vague abdominal discomfort, mild denial of any nausea, vomit, or diarrhea and mild recurrent lower abdominal pain. These symptoms are present for about 3 weeks. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 166 cm, Weight 60.6 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 69, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15 a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed ELOXATIN - 50 MG/10 ML IV, Leucovorin - 200 mg IV, FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg bolus, and ordered CBC, FOBT.
